com.code.aon.common.dao.hibernate
Class HibernateDAO

java.lang.Object
  com.code.aon.common.AbstractFieldMapper
      com.code.aon.common.dao.hibernate.HibernateDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDAO
public class HibernateDAO
extends AbstractFieldMapper
implements IDAO

This class access to the DataSource through Hibernate. It has a basic implementation for all DAO.

Since:
1.0
